title: Import order with valid VIN and parts
description: Verify that the user can successfully import an order with a valid VIN and associated parts details through the Order Management module.

steps.description: Navigate to the Order Management module.
Select the option to import an order.
Provide a valid VIN and complete parts information.
Submit the order import form.
Verify the order appears correctly in the Order Management list with accurate details.

title: Fail order import with invalid VIN format
description: Verify that an order import fails with a validation error when an invalid VIN format is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the Order Management module.
Select the option to import an order.
Provide an invalid VIN format and valid parts information.
Submit the order import form.
Verify validation error is displayed for VIN field and order is not created.

title: Edit existing order details
description: Verify users can edit an existing order's details including VIN and parts information.

steps.description: Navigate to the Order Management module.
Select an existing order from the list.
Open the edit order form.
Modify order details including VIN and parts.
Submit the changes.
Verify the order details updated correctly in the list.

title: Automated status transition on part arrival
description: Verify that when parts arrive, the Main Sheet automatically updates the inventory status and reflects changes in the Call List module.

steps.description: Mark a part as arrived in the Main Sheet module.
Verify the inventory status of the part is updated automatically.
Verify the corresponding record appears with updated status in the Call List module.

title: Order auto-move workflow consistency
description: Verify that the system automatically moves orders through their lifecycle statuses according to configured workflows without manual intervention.

steps.description: Create and add a new order with initial status.
Simulate triggers/events that cause status transitions (e.g., part arrival, booking completion).
Verify the order's status changes automatically reflecting the correct workflow stage at each trigger.

title: Multi-VIN booking scheduling and note support
description: Verify users can create bookings with multiple VINs and add supporting notes in the Booking System.

steps.description: Navigate to the Booking System module.
Create a new booking entry selecting multiple VINs.
Add notes related to the booking.
Save the booking.
Verify booking is listed with all selected VINs and notes accurately displayed.

title: Visual scheduling indicators in booking calendar
description: Verify that the Booking Calendar correctly reflects scheduling indicators and visual cues for multi-VIN bookings.

steps.description: Schedule bookings with varying numbers of VINs in the Booking System.
Verify the calendar grid shows distinct visual indicators representing booking statuses and multiple VINs.

title: Call List customer contact queue management
description: Verify users can manage customer contacts in the Call List, update communication logs, and schedule follow-ups.

steps.description: Navigate to the Call List module.
Select a customer contact entry.
Update communication log with notes and scheduling details.
Save changes.
Verify communication logs update correctly and follow-up scheduling is reflected in the system.

title: Archiving completed orders and bookings with immutable audit trail
description: Verify that completed orders and bookings are archived correctly with a non-editable audit trail and retention period enforcement.

steps.description: Complete an order and associated bookings.
Trigger the archive process for the completed entries.
Verify records are moved to the archive system and are immutable.
Verify retention period is enforced by system and records can be reordered as per feature.

title: Global cross-tab search returns accurate filtered results
description: Validate that the global search correctly locates records across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company with proper advanced filtering options.

steps.description: Input search criteria including VIN, customer name, part number, and company in the global search bar.
Apply various filtering combinations.
Verify only relevant records matching search and filters are displayed.
Select a search result to navigate to source row.
Verify navigation directs to the correct module and row.

title: Notification badges increment and navigation
description: Verify that notification badges reflect the accurate count of pending actions and clicking badges navigates to corresponding items.

steps.description: Trigger system events that generate notifications (e.g., pending orders, due dates).
Verify that notification badges update their numeric counts correctly.
Click on a notification badge.
Verify user is navigated directly to the relevant item in the appropriate module.

title: Zustand state persistence with partialization
description: Verify that the applicationâ€™s state stored in localStorage selectively persists only required slices with partialization and state restoration functions correctly.

steps.description: Modify various UI and data states within the app.
Refresh the browser or restart the app.
Verify that only selective state slices are persisted and restored correctly without leaking sensitive or transient data.

title: Dashboard load and real-time analytics update
description: Verify the real-time dashboard renders capacity and distribution charts with updated data and maintains performance under data change events.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard module.
Simulate updates in order counts and inventory distribution.
Verify charts update their visuals in real-time smoothly without UI lag.

title: Verify UI theme consistency and accessibility
description: Check that the UI consistently applies the Renault-themed dark mode with Renault Yellow accent, ensures accessibility standards, and is responsive on different screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop and several viewport sizes.
Verify Renault themed dark mode with correct colors and contrast.
Verify all interactive elements have accessible labels and keyboard navigation support.
Verify layout and content adapt well on mobile and tablet resolutions.

title: Settings interface part status and history restoration
description: Verify the Settings interface allows managing part statuses, visual appearance, and restoration of history as per configuration.

steps.description: Access the Settings interface.
Modify part status options.
Change appearance theme settings.
Perform history restoration operation.
Verify changes are saved and reflected correctly in the system.
Verify restoration operations update data as expected.

title: Custom AG-Grid rendering and performance with large datasets
description: Verify the custom AG-Grid implementation supports performant virtualized rendering, custom cell components, and retains smooth scrolling and interaction on large datasets.

steps.description: Load large dataset into a grid module such as Main Sheet or Orders.
Verify grid renders quickly and virtualizes rows correctly.
Verify custom cell renderers display data accurately (e.g., StatusCellRenderer, VinCellRenderer).
Scroll rapidly through grid rows.
Verify consistent smooth scrolling and no UI glitches.

title: Error handling on invalid status changes
description: Verify that the system prevents invalid status transitions and shows appropriate error messages in the Main Sheet and Orders.

steps.description: Attempt to manually set an invalid status transition on a part or order.
Verify the system blocks the action and displays a clear error message.

title: Cross-browser compatibility and client-side only compliance
description: Verify the system functions correctly and consistently across supported browsers and confirms to client-side only architecture constraints.

steps.description: Open the application on modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari.
Verify all modules load and function as expected without server-side dependencies.
